channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🔴 17:45 Air alarm to Donetsk Region Watch Further Messages.
item.description: 🔴 17:45 Air alarm to Donetsk Region Watch Further Messages.#Donetsk_. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🟡 17:30 Failure to Dnipropetrovsk Oblast. Please note that the alarm is still in:- Marganets and Marganets Territorial Community- Mirorsk Territorial Community- Chervono-Grigoriva Territorial Community

Please note that the alarm is still in:- Marganets and Marganets Territorial Community- Mirorsk Territorial Community- Chervono-Grigoriva Territorial Community#Dnepropetrovsk_. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
